import "./App.css" import { ArithmeticButtons } from './Components/ArithmeticButtons'; import { Display } from './Components/Display'; import { useState } from "react"; import './Components/ArithmeticButtons.css' function App() { const [calc, setcalc] = useState(""); const [result, setresult] = useState(""); const ops = ["+", "-", "*", "/"] const updateCalc = value => { setcalc (calc + value); } return (
); } export default App;
